sourcesContent:
import {makeStyles} from "@material-ui/core/styles"

export const useStyles = makeStyles(theme => ({
    root: {
        background: '#33cc99',
        color: '#fff',
        fontFamily: 'Open Sans sans-serif',
        maxHeight: 700,
        overflow: 'hidden',
    },

    c: {
        textAlign: 'center',
        display: 'block',
        position: 'relative',
        width: '80%',
        margin: '100px auto',
    },


    _404: {
        fontSize: 220,
        position: 'relative',
        display: 'inline-block',
        zIndex: 2,
        height: 250,
        letterSpacing: 15,
    },
    _1: {
        textAlign: 'center',
        display: 'block',
        position: 'relative',
        letterSpacing: 12,
        fontSize: '4em',
        lineHeight: '80%',
    },
    _2: {
        textAlign: 'center',
        display: 'block',
        position: 'relative',
        fontSize: 20,
    },
    text: {
        fontSize: 70,
        textAlign: 'center',
        position: 'relative',
        display: 'inline-block',
        margin: '19px 0px 0px 0px',
        /* top: 256.301px, */
        zIndex: 3,
        width: '100%',
        lineHeight: '1.2em',
    },


    btn: {
        backgroundColor: 'rgb( 255, 255, 255 )',
        position: 'relative',
        display: 'inline-block',
        width: 358,
        padding: 5,
        zIndex: 5,
        fontSize: 25,
        margin: '0 auto',
        color: '#33cc99',
        textDecoration: 'none',
        marginRight: 10
    },
    right: {
        float: 'right',
        width: '60%',
    },

    hr: {
        padding: 0,
        border: 'none',
        borderTop: '5px solid #fff',
        color: '#fff',
        textAlign: 'center',
        margin: '0px auto',
        width: 420,
        height: 10,
        zIndex: -10,

        '&:after': {
            display: 'inline-block',
            position: 'relative',
            top: '-0.75em',
            fontSize: '2em',
            padding: '0 0.2em',
            background: '#33cc99',
        },
    },

    cloud: {
        width: 350,
        height: 120,
        background: 'linear-gradient(top, #FFF 100%)',
        borderRadius: 100,
        position: 'absolute',
        margin: '120px auto 20px',
        zIndex: -1,
        transition: 'ease 1s',

        '&:after, &:before': {
            content: '',
            position: 'absolute',
            background: '#FFF',
            zIndex: -1,
        },

        '&:after': {
            width: 100,
            height: 100,
            top: -50,
            left: 50,
            borderRadius: 100,
        },
        '&:before': {
            width: 180,
            height: 180,
            top: -90,
            right: 50,
            borderRadius: 200,
        }
    },

    x1: {
        top: -50,
        left: 100,
        transform: 'scale(0.3)',
        opacity: 0.9,
    },

    x1_5: {
        top: -80,
        left: 250,
        transform: 'scale(0.3)',
    },

    x2: {
        left: 250,
        top: 30,
        transform: 'scale(0.6)',
        opacity: 0.6,
    },

    x3: {
        left: 250,
        bottom: -70,
        transform: 'scale(0.6)',
        opacity: 0.8,
    },

    x4: {
        left: 470,
        bottom: 20,
        transform: 'scale(0.75)',
        opacity: 0.75,
    },

    x5: {
        left: 200,
        top: 300,
        transform: 'scale(0.5)',
        opacity: 0.8,
    },


}))
